body_html:
To confirm this can you try running your model like this :
x = Conv2D(filters=32, kernel_size=(5, 5), strides=(2, 2), padding='same', name ='encoder_conv1')(input_image) # run with no activation layer
Remove the x = ReLU()(x) layer after conv layer
After this can you compare the accuracy and share your findings?
body_text:
To confirm this can you try running your model like this :
x = Conv2D(filters=32, kernel_size=(5, 5), strides=(2, 2), padding='same', name ='encoder_conv1')(input_image)  # run with no activation layer
Remove the  x = ReLU()(x)  layer after conv layer
After this can you compare the accuracy and share your findings?
body:
To confirm this can you try running your model like this : 
x = Conv2D(filters=32, kernel_size=(5, 5), strides=(2, 2), padding='same', name ='encoder_conv1')(input_image)  # run with no activation layer
 Remove the  x = ReLU()(x)  layer after conv layer
After this can you compare the accuracy and share your findings?
